name: Multi Knit Fringe Glove
description:
Treat your hands to a bit of whimsy with these lovely silk and wool knit striped fingerless gloves, featuring a fun fringe trim and warm polar fleece lining. 
*By Rising Tide

name: Suede and Lace Fingerless Gloves
description: Pair of fingerless gloves in a lovely lambskin with beautiful antiqued lace trim and an embossed floral design.

name: Patchwork Fingerless Glove
description: Extra long ribbed knit fingerless gloves with colorful design over hands.

name: Sleeve Shelter Armwarmer
description:
Lovely fingerless gloves in a lambswool sweater knit design, featuring a decorative bow and two “rock my world” charms.  
*By Odd Molly 
*Odd Molly will always give pens free reign in respectful ignorance of what trends say they should do. They will always argue affectionately, challenge conventions and at the same time enjoy a little friendly laugh. Everyone is an ideal. You are perfect because you are not. Vive la difference!

name: Tech Glove
description: Don’t let your phone give you frostbite. These cozy striped sweater knit gloves have tech friendly fingers.

name: Rib Rmx Wristband
description:
Hand knitted cotton rib wristbands with thumbhole, leather strap, and metal stud detail. 
*By Psylo

name: Bin Glove
description: Knit arm warmers with stud embellishments. Adds a touch of style to any layered look!

name: Fingerless Flip Glove
description:
Fingerless slubby knit gloves, featuring a versatile mitten pop top. Button detail with official crest design.  
*By Free People

name: Triangle Moto Glove
description: Hand crocheted fingerless gloves with a triangle shaped opening over the back of the hand.

name: Henna Etched Leather Glove
description:
Buttery soft lambskin leather fingerless gloves.  Laser engraved with traditional tattoo markings from the Marquesian Islands. Snap fastening at the wrist and lined in cotton jersey.
*By Eleven44

name: Long Cable Fingerless Gloves
description:
Fingerless leather glove with long cableknit sleeve. 
*By Carolina Amato

name: Marled Armwarmers
description:
Super soft and fuzzy colorful sleeves for your lower arm. Separated thumbholes. 
*By Cecilia Prado

name: Snappy Driver Glove
description:
Leather fingerless driver’s gloves with cutouts for knuckles and snap closure detail. 
*By Carolina Amato

name: Leather Knit Fingerless Gloves
description:
Long ribbed knit cashmere fingerless gloves with a soft leather wrap over the hand. 
*By Carolina Amato

name: Flower Crochet Armwarmer
description:
These handmade fingerless gloves are a lovely floral crochet on the outside, and lined in a soft and cozy fleece. 
*By Nirvanna Designs
*By purchasing this item you help support the women of Nepal. All Nirvanna Designs are hand knit by Nepalese women, allowing them to earn a living working from their homes while taking care of their families.

name: Goatskin Pop Top Glove
description:
Fingerless goatskin gloves lined in a warm ribbed knit wool, and featuring a versatile mitten pop top. Leather button detail. 
*By Carolina Amato
